body:
Hi! I remeber a time ago when this server was named mczone and there was a lots of games who is deleted now. The funniest game was skywars 2.0 it. It was really fun and i think this server will get more players if u take back that game. Really miss it. It was so fun to play it with my friends.
If u think like me please show ur support. I know many who miss it too. Have a good day!

/ullu10

title: Skywars 2.0
